synopsis.text: Touma Inaba, a recent high school graduate and son of an onsen owner, travels to Tokyo with dreams of attending a prestigious university. However, his plans are derailed when he falls ill and fails his entrance exams. While navigating this setback, he finds himself in a complex love triangle involving two captivating women: Urara, his alluring cousin who harbors romantic feelings for him, and Mieko, a stunning model attending Keio University who Touma lies to about his academic status to impress. As he juggles living with Urara and maintaining his deception to win Mieko's heart, Touma's life takes unexpected turns in this enthralling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
